meanings.definition: The act of representing something in a visual form.
meanings.sent1: The picturization of the story in the book helped me understand it better.
meanings.sent2: The artist's picturization of the landscape was incredibly detailed.
meanings.sent3: The picturization of the cat wearing sunglasses made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her picturization of emotions through colors was truly remarkable.
meanings.sent5: The picturization of the sunset was so vivid, it felt like I was there.

meanings.definition: The process of creating a visual image or representation.
meanings.sent1: During the picturization of the movie scene, the director focused on lighting.
meanings.sent2: The picturization of the logo took hours of careful design work.
meanings.sent3: The picturization of the clouds as fluffy cotton candy was whimsical.
meanings.sent4: His picturization of success was like a bright beacon guiding him.
meanings.sent5: The picturization of the character's transformation was truly inspiring.

meanings.definition: The act of turning something into a picture.
meanings.sent1: The picturization of the old building into a sketch was impressive.
meanings.sent2: She excelled in the picturization of abstract ideas into concrete images.
meanings.sent3: The picturization of the recipe made it look like a work of art.
meanings.sent4: His picturization of words into illustrations brought the story to life.
meanings.sent5: The picturization of the memory added a touch of nostalgia to the painting.
